name: Vincent THOMAS, Petitioner v. Honorable, Gregory M. MALLON, Judge, of Delaware County, PA., and Honorable, Chad F. Kenney, Judge of Delaware County, PJ., Respondents

parties: Vincent THOMAS, Petitioner v. Honorable, Gregory M. MALLON, Judge, of Delaware County, PA., and Honorable, Chad F. Kenney, Judge of Delaware County, PJ., Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 29th day of September, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED, and the Protho-notary is DIRECTED to strike the names of the jurists from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
123 A.3d 327
Vincent THOMAS, Petitioner v. Honorable, Gregory M. MALLON, Judge, of Delaware County, PA., and Honorable, Chad F. Kenney, Judge of Delaware County, PJ., Respondents.
No. 114 MM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 29, 2015.
